newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU says vets Boeing buy of McDonnell Douglas.
newsitem.headline: EU says vets Boeing buy of McDonnell Douglas.

text.p: The European Commission said on Thursday it had been formally notified of Boeing Co's proposed acquisition of control of McDonnell Douglas Corp.

It said the deal was submitted to the Commission for clearance on February 18 under the European Union's merger regulation which bans creation or strengthening of dominant positions in the 15-nation market.
European Competition Commissioner Karel Van Miert has already indicated he is worried the alliance may harm fair competition.
Under the terms of the regulation, the Commission has one month from the day the operation was notified to clear the deal or start an in-depth probe which could last up to four months.
The notice was published in the EU's Official Journal of February 26. Interested parties have 10 days to file comments. -- Brussels Newsroom 32 2 287 6800
